django-workflow-system
======================
``django-workflow-system`` is an open-source Django package designed to help with the creation of surveys/activities.

.. note::

   Development is underway by the development team in the Center for Research Computer at Notre Dame.
   This documentation will grow/changed throughout the life of the django-workflow package.
   Readers should expect that pages will often be incomplete and/or move as features are actively
   being developed and implemented.
   Please send any **feedback** to the content presented here to Team Prometheus **prometheus-team@nd.edu**

   :maxdepth: 2
